sentences.sentence: "I ask not wherefore, nor how, thou hast fallen into the pit, or say, rather, thou hast ascended to the pedestal of infamy, on which I found thee." He said.
sentences.translation: “我不对你盘诘，出于什么原因或以何种方式，你堕入了深渊，或者宁可说，你登上了耻辱的刑台，我正是在那儿见到你的。”他说。

sentences.sentence: Yet Mugabe apparently tries to laugh off his global infamy.
sentences.translation: 然而穆加贝显然对他在国际社会上的臭名一笑置之。

sentences.sentence: Paris,--let us confess it--willingly allows infamy to furnish it with comedy.
sentences.translation: 我们应该承认巴黎心甘情愿让无耻在那儿装腔作势。
